statements: SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1;
SELECT description, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT description, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY transaction_id
SELECT transaction_date,amount,description FROM transactions WHERE description LIKE '%online%' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount < 50 ORDER BY transaction_id
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY transaction_id DESC
SELECT * FROM transactions
SELECT amount, description FROM transactions WHERE date = '2022-01-01'
SELECT id, description FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100
SELECT * FROM categories WHERE type = 'income'
SELECT category_name FROM categories
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY date ASC, amount DESC
SELECT id, amount, description FROM transactions WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT category_name, type FROM categories WHERE type = 'expense'
SELECT id, amount, description FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) AS count FROM categories GROUP BY category_name
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT description FROM transactions WHERE date = '2022-01-01';

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, c.category_name FROM transactions t LEFT JOIN transaction_categories tc ON t.transaction_id = tc.transaction_id LEFT JOIN categories c ON tc.category_id = c.category_id;
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM transactions;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, description FROM transactions WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, c.category_name FROM transactions t INNER JOIN transaction_categories tc ON t.transaction_id = tc.transaction_id INNER JOIN categories c ON tc.category_id = c.category_id;

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, t.description, c.category_name FROM transactions t LEFT JOIN transaction_categories tc ON t.transaction_id = tc.transaction_id LEFT JOIN categories c ON tc.category_id = c.category_id WHERE t.amount < 500;

SELECT category_name, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM categories LEFT JOIN transaction_categories ON categories.category_id = transaction_categories.category_id GROUP BY category_name ORDER BY transaction_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, description, amount, date, category FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, description, amount FROM transactions WHERE category = 'Food' ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT id, category FROM transaction_categories WHERE category_id = 'f8c0729c-76f3-4634-948f-8e304b97cf48';
SELECT id, name FROM categories WHERE id = '366def0a-911e-476e-b424-428221116d8b';
SELECT id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT description, category FROM transactions INNER JOIN transaction_categories ON transactions.id = transaction_categories.transaction_id WHERE category_id = 'abcdef12-3456-7890-abcd-ef1234567890';
SELECT transaction_id, name FROM transaction_categories INNER JOIN categories ON transaction_categories.category_id = categories.id WHERE name ILIKE 'food%';
SELECT id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT COUNT(*), AVG(amount) FROM transactions WHERE date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, type FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, type FROM transactions WHERE type = 'income';

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, c.category_name FROM transactions t INNER JOIN transactions_categories tc ON t.transaction_id = tc.transaction_id INNER JOIN categories c ON tc.category_id = c.category_id WHERE c.category_name = 'Groceries';
SELECT u.username, a.account_balance FROM users u INNER JOIN accounts a ON u.user_id = a.user_id WHERE u.username LIKE 'J%';
SELECT t.transaction_date, SUM(t.amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions t GROUP BY t.transaction_date;
